mapper.sql: TAXRGST_NO, DPT_REL_CDE, DPT_CNM, CREATED_USER, BNSRGST_NO, UPDATED_DATE, DEPARTMENT_MRK, VALID_IND, DPT_CADDR, to_char(CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') as "CREATED_DATE", CTCT_CDE, DPT_ABR, RPT_ADDR, DPT_CDE, TEL, INSPRMT_NO, RPT_TEL, FAX, N_DPT_LEVL, ZIP_CDE, UPDATED_USER, DPT_EADDR, DPT_SERNO, C_DPT_ENM, LCN_ABR, INTER_CDE, FND_TM, C_SNR_DPT, ALARM_MRK, CONS_TEL, ABD_TM

TAXRGST_NO as "taxrgstNo", DPT_REL_CDE as "dptRelCde", DPT_CNM as "dptCnm", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", BNSRGST_NO as "bnsrgstNo", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", DEPARTMENT_MRK as "departmentMrk", VALID_IND as "validInd", DPT_CADDR as "dptCaddr", to_char(CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "createdDate", CTCT_CDE as "ctctCde", DPT_ABR as "dptAbr", RPT_ADDR as "rptAddr", DPT_CDE as "dptCde", TEL as "tel", INSPRMT_NO as "insprmtNo", RPT_TEL as "rptTel", FAX as "fax", N_DPT_LEVL as "nDptLevl", ZIP_CDE as "zipCde", UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", DPT_EADDR as "dptEaddr", DPT_SERNO as "dptSerno", C_DPT_ENM as "cDptEnm", LCN_ABR as "lcnAbr", INTER_CDE as "interCde", FND_TM as "fndTm", C_SNR_DPT as "cSnrDpt", ALARM_MRK as "alarmMrk", CONS_TEL as "consTel", ABD_TM as "abdTm"
mapper.update:
update UM_DEPARTMENT
TAXRGST_NO = #{taxrgstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPT_REL_CDE = #{dptRelCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPT_CNM = #{dptCnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BNSRGST_NO = #{bnsrgstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DEPARTMENT_MRK = #{departmentMrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
DPT_CADDR = #{dptCaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CTCT_CDE = #{ctctCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPT_ABR = #{dptAbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_ADDR = #{rptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSPRMT_NO = #{insprmtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_TEL = #{rptTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_DPT_LEVL = #{nDptLevl,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZIP_CDE = #{zipCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPT_EADDR = #{dptEaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DPT_SERNO = #{dptSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DPT_ENM = #{cDptEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCN_ABR = #{lcnAbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTER_CDE = #{interCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FND_TM = #{fndTm,jdbcType=DATE},
C_SNR_DPT = #{cSnrDpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_MRK = #{alarmMrk,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONS_TEL = #{consTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABD_TM = #{abdTm,jdbcType=DATE}
where DPT_CDE = #{dptCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update UM_DEPARTMENT set TAXRGST_NO = #{taxrgstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPT_REL_CDE = #{dptRelCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPT_CNM = #{dptCnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BNSRGST_NO = #{bnsrgstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DEPARTMENT_MRK = #{departmentMrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, DPT_CADDR = #{dptCaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CTCT_CDE = #{ctctCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPT_ABR = #{dptAbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPT_ADDR = #{rptAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSPRMT_NO = #{insprmtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPT_TEL = #{rptTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_DPT_LEVL = #{nDptLevl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZIP_CDE = #{zipCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPT_EADDR = #{dptEaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DPT_SERNO = #{dptSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_DPT_ENM = #{cDptEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LCN_ABR = #{lcnAbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTER_CDE = #{interCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FND_TM = #{fndTm,jdbcType=DATE}, C_SNR_DPT = #{cSnrDpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_MRK = #{alarmMrk,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONS_TEL = #{consTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABD_TM = #{abdTm,jdbcType=DATE} where DPT_CDE = #{dptCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.c_dpt_cde as "id", t.c_dpt_abr as "text", t.c_snr_dpt as "pid", t.c_crt_cde as "departCode" from sale_department t where 1=1 and t.valid_ind = '1' order by t.c_dpt_cde

select DEPARTMENT_ID as "id",DEPARTMENT_ATTR_NAME as "text",SUPER_DEPARTMENT_ID as "pid",DEPARTMENT_CODE as "departCode" from hr_department_information where department_Code in( select substr(companyid,0,14) from HR_USER_DEPARTMENT hu, hr_department_information hd where hu.companyid = hd.department_code and hu.email=#{loginUserCode})
select distinct substr(d.dept_code,0,2) as "deptCode" from um_user_dept d where d.user_code = #{loginUserCode} and d.VALID_IND = '1'
select DPT_CDE as "id",DPT_ABR as "text",C_SNR_DPT as "pid" from um_department where VALID_IND = '1' and dpt_cde in(#{dptId})
